body_html:
Thanks @vrv for the review. The PR has been updated to use None instead of -1 for shapes. I tried to use merge_with though it seems that there is no flag to disable the compatibility check. So an error will be thrown:

ValueError: Shapes (?, 1) and (1200, 3) are not compatible

If I try to merge [None, 1] with [1200, 3]. For that I added additional logic to process the shape.

Please take a look and see if there are any issues.
body_text:
Thanks @vrv for the review. The PR has been updated to use None instead of -1 for shapes. I tried to use merge_with though it seems that there is no flag to disable the compatibility check. So an error will be thrown:
ValueError: Shapes (?, 1) and (1200, 3) are not compatible

If I try to merge [None, 1] with [1200, 3]. For that I added additional logic to process the shape.
Please take a look and see if there are any issues.
body:
Thanks @vrv for the review. The PR has been updated to use `None` instead of `-1` for shapes. I tried to use `merge_with` though it seems that there is no flag to disable the compatibility check. So an error will be thrown:
```
ValueError: Shapes (?, 1) and (1200, 3) are not compatible
```
If I try to merge `[None, 1]` with `[1200, 3]`. For that I added additional logic to process the shape.

Please take a look and see if there are any issues.
